name: Dual shot
desc: Shoot two arrows forward simultaneously

name: continuous fire
desc: Shoot two arrows straight forward

name: Umbrella fire
desc: Fire two more arrows to the forward sides

name: Reverse fire
desc: Shoot one more arrow backwards

name: Flank fire
desc: Shoot one more arrow to the left and one more to the right

name: Penetration
desc: The arrow hits the enemy and penetrates and continues to fly

name: Atk 1
desc: Gives the character a small amount of damage

name: Atk 2
desc: Increases the character's damage by a large amount

name: Evasion
desc: Increased the character's dodge rate by a small amount

name: Critical Hit + Critical Damage 1
desc: Increases the character's critical chance and critical damage by a small amount

name: Critical + Critical Damage 2
desc: Increases your character's critical chance and critical damage by a significant amount

name: Attack speed increased by 1
desc: Increased character attack speed in small amounts

name: Attack speed increased by 2
desc: Increased the character's massive attack speed

name: HP
desc: Increased character life limit

name: recover
desc: Restores the character's current health

name: Move
desc: Increased character movement speed by a small amount

name: Freeze
desc: Hit enemies will slow down their attack speed and movement speed

name: Burn
desc: Hit enemies take burn damage

name: Lightning
desc: A hit enemy fires lightning at nearby enemies

name: bloodthirst
desc: Restores health when killing enemies

name: catapult
desc: When an arrow hits an enemy, it will affect a nearby enemy
